abstract.t: Devices using zeroconf networking protocols can communicate using IPwithout requiring user configuration or infrastructure services likeDHCP and DNS.The options available to secure zeroconf networks are canvassed. Acomparison is made between bootstrapping IPSec and securing sampleprotocols from each area listed in the zeroconf working groupcharter. This shows IPSec to be the most promising approach forsecuring zeroconf protocols.
